name: Haimeta
description: Haimeta is an AI-powered creative platform that enables users to generate images, videos, 3D models, and immersive virtual spaces from text prompts and images through human-AI collaboration.
longDescription: Haimeta is an all-in-one AI creative suite designed to democratize creativity, allowing beginners and professionals alike to transform simple ideas into multimedia content without needing advanced skills or coding. Its mission is to make creativity accessible, expressive, and culturally resonant by blending human intuition with AI capabilities, breaking down technical barriers and fostering global expression. The platform serves artists, designers, marketers, educators, and everyday users by providing intuitive tools for generating portraits, logos, product designs, short videos, and 3D assets. It solves problems like complex software interfaces and time-consuming design processes through pre-designed templates and multilingual support. Users can build personal creative universes, share works in virtual spaces, and collaborate seamlessly. Ultimately, Haimeta envisions a world where anyone can create with ease, flow, and meaning.
features: AI Image Generation allows users to create diverse, high-quality images from text prompts in various styles, enabling rapid idea visualization without artistic expertise.
AI Portrait Creation transforms uploaded photos into stunning, professional portraits with global aesthetic options, ideal for personal branding or social media enhancement.
Smart Eraser uses AI to remove unwanted objects, people, or blemishes from images effortlessly, delivering clean results for polished photo editing.
Background Remover automatically detects and eliminates image backgrounds while preserving subject integrity, perfect for e-commerce or composite designs.
Video Generation produces short, atmospheric video clips from descriptive text, streamlining content creation for marketing, storytelling, or entertainment purposes.
3D Asset Creation generates lifelike 3D models from prompts, benefiting game developers, architects, or VR enthusiasts with quick prototyping.
HAI SPACE provides a customizable 3D virtual environment to display and interact with creations, promoting community sharing and collaboration among users.
Image Upscaling enhances low-resolution images to high-definition using AI, maintaining details for superior print or digital outputs.
T-Shirt Design Tool assists in generating unique apparel graphics from keywords and styles, simplifying custom merchandise creation for individuals or businesses.
Logo Generator crafts custom logos based on descriptive inputs and templates, accelerating branding efforts with professional results.
Product Background Changer applies realistic new backgrounds to product images with accurate lighting and shadows, optimizing visuals for online sales.

faqs.question: How do I start creating on Haimeta?
faqs.answer: To begin, either upload an image and select a style before clicking create, or enter 2-3 keywords, choose a style, and click create. The platform guides you through intuitive steps for immediate results.

faqs.question: What creation scenarios does Haimeta support?
faqs.answer: Haimeta offers LIFE scenarios like AI Portraits, Group Portraits, Pet Portraits, Social Media Avatars, and Stickers, alongside WORK scenarios such as Logo Designs, T-shirt Designs, Product Background Changes, and Nail Art.

faqs.question: How do I create portrait photos?
faqs.answer: Upload your portrait photo, select a style from the template library, and click 'Create' to generate an AI-enhanced portrait in seconds. Multiple styles ensure diverse and personalized outcomes.

faqs.question: Can I create group photos?
faqs.answer: Yes, use the group photo scenes by uploading multiple portrait photos as prompted, selecting a style, and clicking create to produce cohesive group images.

faqs.question: Is there a free plan on Haimeta?
faqs.answer: Yes, Haimeta provides 100 free HAIBITs daily for limited access to core features, allowing users to explore the platform without immediate subscription costs.

faqs.question: What is HAI SPACE?
faqs.answer: HAI SPACE is a 3D virtual space for displaying creative works, communicating with other creators, and customizing your environment; access it via your profile page.

faqs.question: Can I download and share my creations?
faqs.answer: Yes, all generated works can be downloaded to your device and shared on social media directly from the platform after creation.

faqs.question: Does Haimeta support video generation?
faqs.answer: Yes, users can generate short atmospheric video clips from text prompts, making it easy to produce dynamic content for various uses.

faqs.question: How does Haimeta ensure cultural inclusivity?
faqs.answer: Through multilingual support and diverse style templates inspired by global aesthetics, Haimeta promotes accessible creation across cultures and languages.

faqs.question: What subscription options are available?
faqs.answer: Haimeta offers freemium access with daily free credits, plus paid plans like Basic ($0), Standard ($12/month), Premium ($25/month), and Super ($50/month) for unlimited features and more credits.
